content: उल्का (<ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Uṇ. 3. 42</ls>) {@--1@} A fiery phenomenon in the sky, a meteor; विरराज काचन समं महोल्कया <ls>Śi. 15. 92</ls>; <ls>Ms. 1. 38</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">4. 103</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 145.</ls> {@--2@} A fire-brand, torch; न हि तापयितुं शक्यं सागरांभस्तृणोल्कया <ls>H. 1. 86.</ls> {@--3@} Fire, flame; <ls>Me. 53.</ls>
